setInAppPurchaseListener(com.google.andr.Description: Set a @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchaseListener_E@ for this @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#InterstitialAd_E@. null is acceptable but @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchaseListener_E@ is not set in this case.

Throws: If the the ad unit ID has not been set.
loadAd(com.google.android.gms.ads.AdRequ.Description: Start loading the ad on a background thread.

setPlayStorePurchaseParams(com.google.an.Description: Set an @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#PlayStorePurchaseListener_E@ and app's public key for this @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#InterstitialAd_E@. null for parameter palyStorePurchaseListener is acceptable but @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#PlayStorePurchaseListener_E@ is not set in this case. null for parameter publicKey is acceptable but SDK will work in developer mode and skip verifying purchase data signature with public key.
setPlayStorePurchaseParams(com.google.an.FullName: public void setPlayStorePurchaseParams (PlayStorePurchaseListener playStorePurchaseListener, String publicKey)

getMediationAdapterClassName().Description: Returns the mediation adapter class name. In the case of a mediated ad response, this is the name of the class that was responsible for performing the ad request and rendering the ad. For non-mediated responses, this value will be null.

isLoaded().Description: Returns true if the ad was successfully loaded and is ready to be shown.

getInAppPurchaseListener().Description: Returns the @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#purchase#InAppPurchaseListener_E@ for this @B_com#google#android#gms#ads#InterstitialAd_E@. Returns null if it is not set.

Throws: If the ad unit ID was already set.
